destroy.title: Delete level
destroy.description: Are you sure you want to delete this access level?

destroyMany.title: Delete {{total}} levels
destroyMany.description: Are you sure you want to delete these levels? This action cannot be undone.

restore.title: Restore level
restore.description: Are you sure you want to restore this access level?

restoreMany.title: Restore {{total}} levels
restoreMany.description: Are you sure you want to restore these levels?

new.title: Register access level
new.description: Fill in the data below to register a new level

edit.title: Edit access level
edit.description: Edit the level data by filling in the fields below

cancel.title: Exit
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to exit? You have unsaved changes, they will be lost when confirmed

exclude.title: Delete level
exclude.description: This level will be permanently deleted, are you sure you want to continue?

profile.define_user_description: Select a profile to define as access level user
profile.define_user_alert_title: The selected user will be changed from level

own_level.title: Attention
own_level.description: This is your access level. Changes to permissions may affect your access to the system. Be careful when modifying permissions.

admin_level.title: Attention
admin_level.description: This access level cannot be edited.
